articles.title: Eight-bit floating point
articles.description: Researchers have discovered that for some problems, deep neural networks (DNNs) can get by with low precision weights. Using fewer bits to represent weights means that more weights can fit in memory at once. Microsoft mentioned its proprietary floating point â€¦

articles.description: I've just ordered some SAMD51J20As in both 64-pin TQFP and QFN packages. Checking the SAMD51 datasheet it appears that, while it isn't quite a drop in replacement for SAMD21, it's very close. The power, debug, crystal and sercom port pin placement look...

articles.title: Re: POW(x,y) not working, when using array
articles.description: You're getting integer-math'ed. When floating point numbers are converted to integers, they are TRUNCATED, not rounded, and floating point numbers are not perfectly accurate; pow() returns a floating point number, but because it's floating point, it w...
